mapper.update: UPDATE PROJECT_F SET pname = #{pname}, startdte = to_date(#{startdte},'YYYY-MM-DD'), enddte = to_date(#{enddte},'YYYY-MM-DD'), status = #{status}, tname = #{tname}, ptype = #{ptype}, content = #{content} WHERE pcode = #{pcode}
mapper.select: SELECT VPAI.*,addrisk.rcnt FROM VIEW_PROJECT_ALL_INFO vpai , (SELECT pcode,sts,count(*) rcnt FROM RISK_F rf where sts = '발생예정' group BY pcode,sts) addrisk where VPAI.PCODE = addrisk.pcode(+) and VPAI.EMPNO = #{empno} AND vpai.STATUS ='진행중'

SELECT VPAIT.*,risk.rcnt FROM VIEW_PROJECT_ALL_INFO_TMEMBER vpait , (SELECT pcode,wempno,sts,count(*) rcnt FROM RISK_F where sts = '처리중' GROUP BY pcode,WEMPNO,sts) risk WHERE VPAIT.PCODE = risk.pcode(+) AND VPAIT.MEMBER = risk.wempno(+) AND MEMBER = #{empno} AND STATUS ='진행중'

SELECT rownum ,fin.* from (SELECT ef.* ,pwf.EMPNO,pf.PNAME ,pwf.wname FROM ERROR_F ef,PROJECT_WORK_F pwf,PROJECT_F pf WHERE ef.wno = pwf.wno AND pwf.PCODE = pf.PCODE AND pwf.empno = #{empno} ORDER BY CASE WHEN ef.STATUS ='미처리' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) fin WHERE rownum <= 5

SELECT rownum cnt, fin.* FROM (SELECT werrs.*, pc.pname FROM (SELECT PCODE ,pname FROM PROJECT_F pf WHERE empno = #{empno}) pc , (SELECT pwf.pcode , ef.* FROM ERROR_F ef,PROJECT_WORK_F pwf WHERE pwf.wno = ef.wno) werrs WHERE pc.pcode = werrs.pcode ORDER BY CASE WHEN status = '미처리' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) fin WHERE rownum <=5
SELECT tf.empno key, epf.ENAME label FROM TMEM_F tf , EMP_PINFO_F epf WHERE tf.EMPNO = epf.EMPNO and pcode = #{pcode}
